reviews.text: Pizaro Pizza truly delivers when it comes to authentic Neapolitan-style pizza. The pizzas were perfectly baked, with just the right size and an excellent balance of flavor and texture. The crust had that ideal crisp on the outside with a soft, chewy center‚Äîexactly what you‚Äôd expect from a great Neapolitan pizza. Each bite was rich, tasty, and satisfying. If you‚Äôre a fan of real, quality pizza, Oizaro is definitely worth a visit.

First time stopping at this pizza place and it did not disappoint. We will be back again! Upon entering the establishment you can smell the freshness of dough. We order 2 Napoletana style pizza the Roma & the Sweet Pea and enjoyed each one till the last bite.

Great pizzas, we tried the Napoletana Style Pizza. Very delicious, the service is great. As soon as we walked in we were greeted and offered drinks for the kids so they don‚Äôt have to wait for us to look at the menu. It was our first time and definitely coming back. And I forgot to mention they have different styles of pizza. Give them a try!!

I ordered a magherita 12 inch pizza. I received a lukewarm pizza with 8 - 1 inch X 1.5 inch cubes of mozzarella and they weren‚Äôt melted with a lot of sauce and a couple of sprinkles of basil. To spend close to $20. I could've made better pizza at home.

Absolutely the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had. Wow. The ingredients are fresh!!!  What an incredible flavor!
Customer service is top notch.
Alana is THE BRAND AMBASSADOR for an exceptional first experience.
We will be back!!  ‚ô•Ô∏è

editorial_summary.overview: No-nonsense operation showcasing specialty pizzas cooked in a wood-fired brick oven.

recentReviews.text: Love this place! Great service and great food!

The best pizza around! Also excellent and friendly
service

Always 5/5 experience.
Pizza is wonderful as per usual. Neopolitan is my favorite - the crust is just perfect!
In house ranch is a must, as well as the Calabrian chili! (Pro tip: if you save your crust to the end, mix the Calabrian chili with some ranch and use as a dipping sauce - though I definitely do this for the rest of the pizza too!)

I ordered a magherita 12 inch pizza. I received a lukewarm pizza with 8 - 1 inch X 1.5 inch cubes of mozzarella and they weren‚Äôt melted with a lot of sauce and a couple of sprinkles of basil. To spend close to $20. I could've made better pizza at home.

This place nails what it's trying to do perfectly.

Great job Riley and Team. Y'all are amazing.
Best glueten free pizza i ever. Grandkids love the pizza there too. I had an amazing white wine also. They take great pride in what they are presenting to the quests. Love it there!!

service

Always 5/5 experience.

In house ranch is a must, as well as the Calabrian chili! (Pro tip: if you save your crust to the end, mix the Calabrian chili with some ranch and use as a dipping sauce - though I definitely do this for the rest of the pizza too!)

detailedReviews.author: Abdullah Qawariq
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza. Arguably the best in Houston. My Italian friend likes it so that's a good sign I guess

detailedReviews.author: Francisco Montoya
detailedReviews.text: Nice spot. We came at the lunch rush and there was a big family ahead of us, so it understandably took a little bit to get our food. I shared a Gluten Free Detroit style with my wife and it was pretty good for gluten free. If I get a chance to come back I definitely want to try some of their others.

detailedReviews.author: Kirby Hamann
detailedReviews.text: Been here numerous of times. One of the best pizzas I‚Äôve ever had

detailedReviews.author: Untamable Angel
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was delicious, and I love that they have both Detroit style and neopolian style with fresh mozzarella because my husband and I do not agree and we can each get the style of pizza we want at one place!

detailedReviews.author: Rigo Montenegro
detailedReviews.text: Place is pretty amazing hidden gem. The pizza is 5 star, dough is so fresh, and each bite is packed with flavor due to fresh ingredients. Will be returning. Wow!

detailedReviews.author: Marie Parsons
detailedReviews.text: The pizza here is so good and the staff is friendly! Fast service.

detailedReviews.author: Munchie Biscuit
detailedReviews.text: Food was incredible and service was good.

detailedReviews.author: Mimi Branham
detailedReviews.text: Husband got Detroit and I got regular pizza. His was thick with the cheese crunchy crust you want. Mine was thin crust with the bubbly crust that comes from a hot oven. Fast service and the restaurant was clean.

detailedReviews.author: SURAIYA KAMAL
detailedReviews.text:
My kiddo ranks pizza places and she ranks yall as #1.    I have to agree.  Great pizza and team!

Update:  still the one!  Thanks for great pizza and great service from some original team members like Daniel.

detailedReviews.author: Tony Kessler
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was horrible too expensive. I‚Äôve had better frozen pizzas.

detailedReviews.author: Arpan Gutgutia
detailedReviews.text: You go to Pizaros for their pizzas, everything else is tertiary. Their Patata-e-fungi are so so good. Overall their take on neopolitan and Detroit style are just so good. Go there and eat while it's hot.

detailedReviews.author: Monica Brinez
detailedReviews.text: We have tried napoletana pizzas in other countries before and decided to eat at Pizaro last weekend. Some reviews say it is overpriced but maybe they don't understand this is not a chain restaurant pizza,  ingredients give the value and make the difference and that is why they got a certification for Vera Pizza Napoletana. I will come back!

detailedReviews.author: Zainab Bawany
detailedReviews.text: The most delicious pizza in Houston!

detailedReviews.author: Jacob Wright
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic order at counter pizza spot. Their Neapolitan is fantastic, and the reason to come. Few places have authentic Neopalitan style, let alone a good one. Their new York and Detroit styles are also very good.

detailedReviews.author: Olivia M
detailedReviews.text: Best Neapolitan pizza in town

detailedReviews.author: Whit Mitchell
detailedReviews.text: Been here about 10 times now. I can not say enough about the crust and sauce. FANTASTIC! Toppings are fresh and delicious. Looking forward to being on that side of the city soon. WONDERFUL and APPRECIATED.

detailedReviews.author: Priscilla Chamberlain
detailedReviews.text: First time stopping at this pizza place and it did not disappoint. We will be back again! Upon entering the establishment you can smell the freshness of dough. We order 2 Napoletana style pizza the Roma & the Sweet Pea and enjoyed each one till the last bite.

detailedReviews.author: Peter Montero
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza! If you like pizza, eat here.

detailedReviews.author: Imran Hanif
detailedReviews.text: Pizaro Pizza truly delivers when it comes to authentic Neapolitan-style pizza. The pizzas were perfectly baked, with just the right size and an excellent balance of flavor and texture. The crust had that ideal crisp on the outside with a soft, chewy center‚Äîexactly what you‚Äôd expect from a great Neapolitan pizza. Each bite was rich, tasty, and satisfying. If you‚Äôre a fan of real, quality pizza, Oizaro is definitely worth a visit.

detailedReviews.author: mddesd mddesd
detailedReviews.text: Just like West Grey location they are amazing. Best pizza dough in town and probably best overall. And brilliant personalized service which knows what you ordered last time and within seconds have it going. Wonderful experience.

detailedReviews.author: Kimberly Morrison
detailedReviews.text:
All their pizzas are AMAZING, but our Go-To is the New York Meat Market.  I'm not sure what spices they use, but this is the best pizza I've ever tasted!
The store is clean and the employees are friendly.
I'd give them 10 stars if I could!

detailedReviews.author: francisco gimenez
detailedReviews.text: If you are looking for a good Neapolitan-style pizza, this is the place that is attentive and clean. It is not a luxury restaurant, it is to eat a pizza and be fascinated by its dough and its ingredients.

detailedReviews.author: Dion Shaqiri
detailedReviews.text: Great pizzas, we tried the Napoletana Style Pizza. Very delicious, the service is great. As soon as we walked in we were greeted and offered drinks for the kids so they don‚Äôt have to wait for us to look at the menu. It was our first time and definitely coming back. And I forgot to mention they have different styles of pizza. Give them a try!!

detailedReviews.author: Johnny Martinez
detailedReviews.text: 5 stars is not enough! Atmosphere is chill, service is impecable, and Food is superb üëåüèΩ

detailedReviews.author: aaleeba
detailedReviews.text: Good pie

detailedReviews.author: Jonathan T
detailedReviews.text:
üåüPizaro‚Äôs Pizza: The Best Pizza in the United States, Hands Down - from an Expert Pizza Reviewer üçï

Pizaro‚Äôs Pizza is, without question, the best pizza restaurant I‚Äôve ever been to‚Äîperiod. I‚Äôve tried pizza from all over the country, hopping from one famous spot to the next across multiple states, and let me tell you: nothing comes close. Even my New York neighbors admit that Pizaro‚Äôs destroys anything they‚Äôve had back home, which is saying something!

What sets Pizaro‚Äôs apart? Everything is made from scratch‚Äîevery single day. The pizza sauce is freshly made in-house, and all their ingredients are imported straight from Italy. We‚Äôre talking authentic, high-quality ingredients with no additives, just pure, bold flavors. This commitment to quality shines through in every bite.

Pizaro‚Äôs offers a range of styles‚ÄîNew York Style, Deep Dish, Neapolitan, and even incredible flatbreads. They also have unique experiences like date night packages where you can learn how to make pizza, but honestly, none of that matters to me as much as the food itself. It‚Äôs the most delicious pizza I‚Äôve ever had in my life.

If you‚Äôre ordering, let me give you a pro tip: go for the New York Style pizza, extra sauce, and double regular pepperoni. Trust me on the extra sauce‚ÄîPizaro‚Äôs balances it perfectly. It‚Äôs not messy or overwhelming; it‚Äôs just the perfect addition to an already flawless pizza.

Yes, the pizzas here are more expensive than what you‚Äôd get at a chain like Domino‚Äôs or Papa John‚Äôs, but you‚Äôre not just paying for pizza‚Äîyou‚Äôre paying for the BEST PIZZA ever and an unmatched experience. This is artisan pizza, the real deal, and worth every penny.

The difference between the quality at Pizaro‚Äôs vs anywhere else is basically the same as getting a Ferrari instead of a beat up Corolla‚Ä¶ no joke

Pizaro‚Äôs beats every other pizza place in Houston without contest, and I‚Äôd go as far as to say it‚Äôs the best in the entire country. Come here once, and I promise you‚Äôll never want pizza from anywhere else again.

Also, the pizza heats up really well the next day - can‚Äôt decide if I like it more the day of, or the next day. It‚Äôs just too good!

detailedReviews.author: soylent green
detailedReviews.text:
Best Pizza I have tried in Houston.

A little pricey, but worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Danky
detailedReviews.text: Yesterday was my 1st day working I tried the bbq chicken deep dish and it was absolutely amazing incredible fantastic anything but mediocre bite into it it's like mmmm and then basil get your taste buds you like God damn and you just want to eat until you hurt yourself and get sleepy I must say some of the best pizza I ever had and you will get your money's worth you eat this pizza you would not look back at  Little Caesars, Papa John's Pizza Hut ,Nor Domino's or Pizza patron hands downü§£

detailedReviews.author: Joe C
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm writing to review both the Pizaro‚Äôs Pizza restaurant and Pizza University. I‚Äôve been coming to the restaurant for several years. Everything you can try is delicious. You won‚Äôt be disappointed. Recently I attended, 2, Pizza university classes about very specific pizza doughs, sauces and cheese. Nicole, the owner and professor for Pizza University, was fantastic. She delivered everything she promised for the cost, which was a great fair value. I wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to eat at the restaurant or take another class. It‚Äôs enjoyable, you‚Äôll learn a lot and you even bring home some food. Thanks Nicole for all you did. I‚Äôll be seeing you and your husband when I‚Äôm there to eat or perhaps even a class covering something else we didn‚Äôt have time for.

detailedReviews.author: aaron noama
detailedReviews.text: Great customer service great food highly recommended

detailedReviews.author: Natalie Williams
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza I‚Äôve had so far!!

detailedReviews.author: Helen Dupree
detailedReviews.text:
Absolutely the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had. Wow. The ingredients are fresh!!!  What an incredible flavor!
Customer service is top notch.
Alana is THE BRAND AMBASSADOR for an exceptional first experience.
We will be back!!  ‚ô•Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Mahesh
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was great, staff were friendly and we were pleasantly surprised at how great the location was. Would definitely come back

detailedReviews.author: Rouga Omidi
detailedReviews.text:
This is our family favorite!! They have the very best pizza!!

Great service and support their community in incredibly meaningful ways ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

my favorite is the patata e funghi!! It‚Äôs amazing and my husband loves the Detroit style pizzas. They also have lovely salads. Super family friendly for dining in and easy for picking up.

I have heard wonderful things about their pizza classes

detailedReviews.author: Burak Emekli
detailedReviews.text: Best pie in Houston hands down! Just like back home in NY

detailedReviews.author: Dayle Pugh
detailedReviews.text: It's been a great restaurant for a long time.

detailedReviews.author: Andrina Stewart
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza! Everything I have tasted here has been delicious! Love the margarita pizza and they have a great lunch special deal.

detailedReviews.author: Tania ‚ÄúTiiTii‚Äù O
detailedReviews.text: This is one of the best pizza places I have tasted in Houston. Their NY style is amazing. pizza crust is just right not too thick and most importantly crispy from the bottom and the crust. Menu is simple and to the point.

detailedReviews.author: Gabriela Barros
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is some of the best we‚Äôve had in Houston

detailedReviews.author: Jamz Banron
detailedReviews.text: Paid 37$ for a small pizza that once delivered was moist and soggy and couldn‚Äôt even be held without falling apart. Pictures look amazing, but the pizza was disappointing for the price.

detailedReviews.author: Max Artero
detailedReviews.text: We had a margherita and a clabrese. Both delicious. Sauce was the best part. 10/10. Would be coming back to try their Detroit style and their NY style pizzas.

detailedReviews.author: Bridget
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Htown.

detailedReviews.author: Christina M
detailedReviews.text:
Nov 30, 2024 update
I certainly don't come here enough! Since the first time I experienced pizza from Pizaro's, I have brought my aunt, my younger sister, and on this most recent visit, my older sister. On her first bite, she says, "Oh, this is good!" Enough said. Unfortunately, for her Idaho doesn't have a restaurant that i know of that comes close to the quality and taste of Pizaro's. Love you guys!

March 2024
If you currently love your favorite pizza place and you haven't tried Pizaro's, then you are in for a treat! This place has the best quality, most delicious, and yummy pizza I have ever tasted in the USA. I only wish for one thing, more Pizaro's pizza locations. Warning: After trying Pizaro's Pizza, you will be disappointed in 2 things, 1) There are few locations, and 2) that your current favorite pizza place will be mediocre compared to Pizaro's. Sorry, not Sorry. This is THE BEST PIZZA I'VE EVER HAD!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Rebecca Brown
detailedReviews.text: I'm visiting from little ol Idaho and I am hooked. We had a napoletana pizza with some added toppings. I loved it was so quick to make and soooooo divine! Such yummy pizza crust, sauce, and toppings. We ate this pizza so fast, even my little niece snatched the coveted last piece. Was wondering how it would reheat, but nobody at our table knew, because there's never leftovers.  I don't know what I'm going to do in Idaho, because this is all the pizza I will ever want from now on! YUMMY!

detailedReviews.author: Shauna Riley
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town!

detailedReviews.author: √ìscar L√≥pez
detailedReviews.text: Meilleur pizza du coin, des ingr√©dients  de qualit√©s ,savoureux et un prix juste !

detailedReviews.author: Kay 92 Michelle
detailedReviews.text: Clean, friendly and efficient.

detailedReviews.author: Gibby
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was disappointing.  I had high hopes. The Detroit style was undercooked and the NY style was so under seasoned. Not one Italian herb or spice there. The sauce is really sweet and just overpowers everything.

detailedReviews.author: Serge R (IAHGVA)
detailedReviews.text: I love the true Neapolitan pizzas at Pizaro but I only take them as take out as the seating area is not really welcoming. But the pizzas are awesome!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Liz S
detailedReviews.text: Really good pizza, and they have the much menu: small pizza + salad, it is wonderful.

detailedReviews.author: Andie Andie
detailedReviews.text: This is the first time that I've had authentic pizza, it was delicious!  There are so many choices.   The service was great! I will definitely be back.

detailedReviews.author: Maria Elena S
detailedReviews.text: We were looking for a place with outdoor seating.  You order at the counter and the food is brought to you.  My brother ordered a family size vegetarian Detroit style pizza. The dough is delicious and so is the marinara sauce.  You are brought plates.  But you have to get your drinks, silverware and napkins on the side of the restaurant.  They have some bottled and canned refrigerated drinks next to the cashier.  My Mom ordered a canoli.  She said it was ok. They have a lunch special for about $11.  It includes a small pizza.  Too bad they don't have pizza by the slice.

detailedReviews.author: Ben Jocz
detailedReviews.text:
This pizza is so good. And on top of that they are able to deliver gluten free pizza with 9 options (the GF options are all done Detroit Style which is the square shaped pan pizza that‚Äôs got a good amount of breading) and they take the prep seriously.

If you‚Äôve got a taste for a bit more jalape√±o than you‚Äôd normally find in a pizza place, the Vesuvius  is my absolute favorite.

This is not a bargain pizza shop so the food does cost money, but it is well worth it in my opinion.

Thank y‚Äôall for providing a delicious gluten free option.

detailedReviews.author: Reinaldo Medina
detailedReviews.text: I was impressed of the taste of the Napoletana pizza. It was great and with real Italian flavor. Nice job guys!

detailedReviews.author: Kurt
detailedReviews.text: This üçï is the best you can get in Houston (not saying a ton I know). If they were located in Brooklyn people would say it‚Äôs a legit pie. I‚Äôve had all the best in Brooklyn including Di Fara‚Äôs (RIP Dom). Houston has very few truly good pizzas. Maybe 3 at best if you count Gypsy Poet. Home Slice comes in at a more distant 2nd ü•àplace. It‚Äôs definitely good too. But Pizaro‚Äôs FTW! üôåüèº Only dinged them on service because sometimes they‚Äôre randomly closed and the counter clerk is confused.

detailedReviews.author: Julien Merlin
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza I‚Äôve had so far in Houston!

detailedReviews.author: Greg Norris
detailedReviews.text: Despite an unassuming location, easily one of Houston's best pizza places.

detailedReviews.author: Alexander Parra
detailedReviews.text: I really like food , delicious. Organic pizza

detailedReviews.author: Giovanni Bonilla
detailedReviews.text: Buona Pizza
